backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing product catalog, orders, inquiries, and user profiles with admin‑restricted modifications and access‑controlled queries.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light/dark mode and applying global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and setting the site title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing setup using TanStack Router with layout and routes for products, checkout, admin, and app views.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing login, loading, or access-denied states as needed.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Fetches and displays all customer orders in a sortable table with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductImp: Handles uploading, parsing, validating, and importing product spreadsheets with success and error feedback.
frontend/src/components/app/AppInquiryPa: Provides a customer inquiry form that submits data to the backend and shows success or error messages.
frontend/src/components/app/AppProductLi: Displays a product catalog using backend data or sample data with full loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, content area, and bottom navigation for catalog and inquiry sections.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: UI component handling login/logout with Internet Identity and principal copying.
frontend/src/components/catalog/SampleCa: Alert banner notifying users that sample products are displayed and linking to admin.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer showing brand info, navigation links, services list, and updated contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation (including Admin/App), mobile menu, and AuthControl integration.
frontend/src/content/sampleContent.ts: Provides static sample store info, products, and service listings for demo content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Hook that updates the document title and restores the previous one on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for products, orders, inquiries, profiles, and admin checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color themes, layout utilities, and custom component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with company story, values, and a logo using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Provides an admin dashboard with tabs for viewing orders and importing products, protected by an admin guard.
frontend/src/pages/AppPage.tsx: Shows a mobile app-like shell that switches between a product catalog and an inquiry panel.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including form validation, product lookup, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information and a form for submitting inquiries with success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring store hero content, features, and a small product showcase using backend or sample data.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPlacedPage.tsx: Shows order confirmation details and navigation options after a successful order.
frontend/src/pages/ProductQuantityPage.t: Product detail page allowing quantity selection, price calculation, and navigation to checkout with validation and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product catalog with search, filters, sample data fallback, and navigation to individual product pages.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of predefined services with icons and a section explaining service benefits.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats bigint prices into INR currency strings using en-IN locale.
frontend/src/utils/parseProductImportFil: Parses CSV/XLSX files into product objects, validates required fields, and collects row-level errors.
frontend/src/utils/principalFormat.ts: Safely extracts and truncates Internet Identity principal strings for display.
frontend/src/utils/safeParse.ts: Provides safe parsing utilities for BigInt and positive integers plus a quantity validator.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with session storage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme options, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing admin-access issues, required admin seeding, and pending feature requests to register and persist a specific admin Principal.
